Vision 
 
 
To produce world- class professionals, who are responsible citizens and good 
human beings. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Mission 
 
 
1. To identify and attract the most promising students from diverse 
communities, to shape them into visionary leaders and world- class 
professionals. 
 
2. To impart quality education to students, irrespective of their financial 
background ethnicity, gender or religion to create an inclusive society. 
 
3. To promote research and scholarly activities to generate knowledge.
